attributes.action: Stop attacking the Middle East, Including Syria, Iraq. The "UN-JUST" War.
attributes.additional_details: The U.K are followers, once being leaders of change and civil rights. Donald Trump and the U.S have decided to act on propaganda of "chemical" attacks. It has led to the bombing of The Syrian king Assad, once belived to be an ally of the west as he was helping wage the war on "ISIS".We have to ask our selfs what have the Syrian people did to deserve such treatment, and if there is no hidden agenda why would the west play both sides? we have to ask ourselfs why there is constant war and isit just
attributes.background: The U.K have dropped 11 times more bombs on the general public of Syria and Iraq then at the height of our invasion of Afghanistan. It is fact that we supported Assad for 6months-1year, we bombed schools, city's, hospitals and residential areas. the people from these areas have no way of hurting us.
